name: subtreasury
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of the nine former branches of the US Treasury (= the government department that is responsible for financial matters) in certain US cities: It was decided that government currency should be kept in subtreasuries in various cities around the country. The money was transferred from the sub-treasury to the banks.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was employed as a clerk in the subtreasury in Chicago.The location of the subtreasury was decided by a popular vote. He was working in a sub-treasury in San Francisco when he wrote his first book.
